about_the_game:
The Kite is a small dramatic point-and-click adventure. The game highlights the problems of a struggling family.

The main character of the game is Mary, a resident of a regular town in 90th. She is a loving mother and careful wife, but her husband, full of different problems, falls down to the alcoholism and domestic abuse. Mary agrees to tolerate, but not when it is about life and health of her child, she is ready to do anything...

Features

  • Explore atmospheric hand-painted locations with challenging puzzles
  • Enjoy a dramatic story with an unexpected ending
  • Listen to an amazing soundtrack by сlassic composers.

content_descriptors.notes: Contain violence, suggestive themes, minimal blood, infrequent use of strong language.
